title: Peter Mandelson – 2009 Speech to Labour Party Conference
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Peter Mandelson, the then Secretary of State for Business, Innovation and Skills, to the 2009 Labour Party Conference.
content:
Conference, let me say after these years away – it’s good to be back home.
